c74object.name: sjf.AAIM_melodyVary~
c74object.digest: Stochastically generated variations on a given melody
c74object.description: Stochastically generated variations on a given melody.

method.name: melody
method.description: This sets the melody. It is expected as a list of pairs [ pitch, trigger type ]. Where the possible trigger types are rest(0), tie(1), newNote(2).
